trans-unit.source: The instance context that has finished processing.
Represents the method that is called when an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje metodę, która jest wywoływana po <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> zakończeniu przetwarzania obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Use an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> to notify the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] runtime that an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: Użyj <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> powiadomiono [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] środowiska uruchomieniowego który <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> zakończeniu przetwarzania obiektu.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> object notifies the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> has finished its work, WCF calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> once again.
trans-unit.target: Gdy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> obiektu powiadamia środowiska uruchomieniowego który <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> zakończył jego pracy, wywołania WCF <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ponownie.

trans-unit.source: This cycle continues until <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: Ten cykl będzie wykonywany do momentu <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> zwraca `true` i kontekst zamknięcia i ponownego przetworzenia.
